Self.Wiki: This map object represents an retry point event.

RetryPartName.Wiki: The part that is associated with the retry point.

TriggerEventFlagID.Wiki: The event flag that must be ON for the retry point to be active.

RetryDistance.Wiki: The distance at which the retry point is active (only used if no retry region is set).

RetryRegionName.Wiki: The name of the region that defines the retry area.
